verbs.description: UPDATE , May 27 : [ARG0: A writer at the BreakingDefense.com website] [V: estimates] [ARG1: that Mainland China 's defense spending on a Purchasing Power Parity basis is $ 434.5 billion , and that its spending plus Russia 's PPP spending of $ 157.6 billion is only about 2 percent below the USA 's $ 606 billion .] On Friday 's The Five on Fox , Juan Williams sharply criticized President Donald Trump 's speech

UPDATE , May 27 : A writer at the BreakingDefense.com website estimates that [ARG1: Mainland China 's defense spending on a Purchasing Power Parity basis] [V: is] [ARG2: $ 434.5 billion] , and that its spending plus Russia 's PPP spending of $ 157.6 billion is only about 2 percent below the USA 's $ 606 billion . On Friday 's The Five on Fox , Juan Williams sharply criticized President Donald Trump 's speech

UPDATE , May 27 : A writer at the BreakingDefense.com website estimates that Mainland China 's defense spending on a Purchasing Power Parity basis is $ 434.5 billion , and that [ARG1: its spending plus Russia 's PPP spending of $ 157.6 billion] [V: is] [ARG2: only about 2 percent below the USA 's $ 606 billion] . On Friday 's The Five on Fox , Juan Williams sharply criticized President Donald Trump 's speech

UPDATE , May 27 : A writer at the BreakingDefense.com website estimates that Mainland China 's defense spending on a Purchasing Power Parity basis is $ 434.5 billion , and that its spending plus Russia 's PPP spending of $ 157.6 billion is only about 2 percent below the USA 's $ 606 billion . [ARGM-LOC: On Friday 's The Five on Fox] , [ARG0: Juan Williams] [ARGM-MNR: sharply] [V: criticized] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's speech]
